Name: is_ascending
Description: Checks if the numeric arguments are in ascending order.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: is_ascending_loose
Description: Checks if the numeric arguments are in ascending order, allowing equal adjacent numbers.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: is_descending
Description: Checks if the numeric arguments are in descending order.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: is_descending_loose
Description: Checks if the numeric arguments are in descending order, allowing equal adjacent numbers.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: has_adjacent_equals
Description: Checks if the numeric arguments contain any equal adjacent numbers.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: are_all_numbers
Description: Checks if all arguments are numbers.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: median
Description: Returns the median value from a list of numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: mode
Description: Returns the mode (most frequent) value from a list of numeric arguments. If multiple modes exist, returns the smallest one.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: stdev
Description: Returns the sample standard deviation of a list of numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: var
Description: Returns the sample variance of a list of numeric arguments.

Arguments.Description: A list of repeating numeric arguments.
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: count
Description: Returns the number of arguments provided.

Arguments.Description: A list of arguments.
Any type of parameter.
